archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0908
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, when I am seeing what access types are available at my address, I want to look for the answers online without logging in or giving any info, so that I can check on access types quickly and privately

properties.value: DS: Similar to REQ_BSS_1198 As a prospective customer, I want to be able to see the mobile coverage map In scope for Comarch: integration with a map via a CMS zone, adding a link or otherwise embedding the map https://www.vodafone.co.nz/broadband/rural/

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
